pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is an AppArmor security policy specifically written for closed source software, designed to restrict closed source software from accessing users' sensitive directories (such as .ssh) and system-sensitive information directories, providing a certain level of protection. These security policies take effect after installing AppArmor and enabling the relevant services.
这是针对闭源软件编写的AppArmor安全策略，主要限制闭源软件对用户敏感目录的 访问，例如.ssh目录，以及系统敏感信息目录，起到一定的保护作用。这些安全 策略在安装AppArmor并启用相关服务后生效。
